page.title: 14PENRITH SHOW
page.content: {Penrith Agricultural Society's Annual {Show}- important event in farming area takes place on last Saturday in July at Brougham Hall Farm -23 acres - 7000 attendance. This traditional show aims to attract farmers & the public.This year's theme is{'Dairying Past and {Present'.}For{farmers}the competitive classes show the standards of{stock they aim to rear, & 60 yds of trade stands show modern{farming equipment & {products}from feeds to fencing. The public can see products for home and garden.An'industrial' marquee displays baking,jams,wines,handicrafts,art & photographs,floral art & children's entries. Continental{breeds of cattle recently introduced:Blonde d'Aquitaine Charolais,Limousin & Simmental. Horses ponies,sheep,goats,dogs & poultry also shown.Popular attractions:show jumping driving competitions, sheep dog trials
